entities.name: beedle
entities.description: Beedle is mentioned as a possible source of the idea for the Sorcerer's Stone. The text does not provide further information about Beedle.

entities.name: sorcerer's stone
entities.description: The Sorcerer's Stone is an object that makes you immortal. It is mentioned as a possible inspiration for the idea of reversing death.

entities.name: xenophilius
entities.description: Xenophilius is cooking something in the kitchen, and Harry wonders if he can eat enough to spare his feelings. The text does not provide further information about Xenophilius.

entities.name: harry's cloak
entities.description: Harry's Cloak is a magical object that makes the trio invisible when they are under it. It is mentioned as being infallible and has never been spotted.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is discussing the Cloak with him.

relationships.description: Beedle probably took the idea from the Sorcerer's Stone.
Ron has used Harry's Cloak and thinks it is infallible.
